books.title: -Hitogatana-
books.description:
Crimes commited using manned combat-androids dubbed "Katana" run rampant. In an effort to maintain order, the government has organized the AKCD - "Anti Katana Crime Division." Togusa of the 8th squad of the AKCD, while holding existential doubts as a Human-Katana hybrid, continually casts himself into battle…  
  
 [Official Korean](https://ridibooks.com/books/845012944)  
 [Official Traditional Chinese](https://www.books.com.tw/products/0010625775)

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/-%E3%83%92%E3%83%88%E3%82%AC%E3%82%BF%E3%83%8A-)

books.title: 100-Year-Old Top Chef
books.description:
The world’s greatest chef. First, second, third… and sixth life. The combined time I’ve spent on cooking is over 100 years.

“I can’t do this anymore.” There is only one way to stop this endless reincarnation and regression. This time, I will definitely succeed.

<100-Year-Old Top Chef>
